channel.title: Making free websites for server owners
channel.description:
Well, im deciding to make highquality forums (hosted for free) and mantian and modify them. I will not ask for anything in return, im doing this to aid the private server population, so they can consontrate on server devloping and not worry about having to make a forum. All forums are invision free with .co.nr redirects, logos will be made by me, and sometimes custom skins. Buttons and markers also will be made free, and advertisment forum signatures. Staff for your server will recieve custom signatutres.
If you want to take advantage of this limited time only offer please fill this form out and post.
[code]
[b]Server Name:[/b]
[b]Server Discripton:[/b]
[b]Server ip/ham:[/b]
[b]Server Staff:[/b]
[b]Server Rules:[/b]
[b]Disired Color Sceme:[/b]
[b]Forum catorgrys:[/b]
[b]Forum Subjects:[/b][/code]
Sample Websites: http://z4.invisionfree.com/chillaxscape
Please rep+ those who can if the idea is liked or frowned apon :)
For other matters, web pages, status page, irc chat channels,domain names, java chats. Anything that will use space on my dedicated will acur some cost. You will also gain access to my private download and source code libary.

item.title: Making free websites for server owners
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

And using a free forum host you can’t really say “Your Setting it up”
